title: Bug 103963: Missing Friendly Error Message for Empty Series
description: When there is no data for a series, the application fails to display a friendly error message as expected.
OB: No friendly error message is shown when selecting a column without data for the chart.
EB: A user-friendly error message should be displayed when selecting a column without data for the chart.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set data definition for the chart.
3. Select a column without data.
